DOC.criteria: 18 year age old time enrollment Presenting ED within 6 hour onset chest discomfort ( pain , pressure , tightness , etc ) consistent possible diagnosis AMI ACS initial ECG nondiagnostic injury ( injury equivalent result emergent reperfusion therapy ) . ( NOTE : Subjects chest discomfort episodic stuttering nature may include ED presentation within 6 hour symptom onset . ) Experiencing least 30 minute chest pain anginal equivalent symptom . ( Note : Subjects symptoms short duration due pharmacologic intervention may include . ) Patient ( Legal Representative ) unable unwilling provide write informed consent . Patient unwilling unlikely comply study procedure , include protocolspecified blood sample telephone followup 30 day 6 month .
